content: अंतरयः --रायः {@--1@} An impediment, obstacle, hindrance, what stands in the way; स चेत् त्वमंतरायो भवसि च्युतो विधिः <ls>R. 3. 45</ls>, <ls n="R.">14. 65</ls>; बह्वंतराययुक्तस्य धर्मस्य त्वरिता गतिः <ls>Pt. 3. 101</ls>; अस्य ते बाणपथवर्तिनः कृष्णसारस्य अंतरायौ तपस्विनौ संवृत्तौ <ls>Ś. 1</ls> vl. standing in the way. {@--2@} (In Vedānta) Hindrance to the concentration of mind which is said to be of four kinds, लय, विक्षेप, कषाय and रसास्वाद. {@--3@} An intervention, a covering, screen; दाहप्रेम्णा सरसबिसिनीपत्रमात्रांतरायः <ls>Māl. 3. 12.</ls> {@--4@} (With the Jainas) Interference or obstruction offered to those who are engaged in seeking deliverance, and consequent prevention of their accomplishment of it; one of the 8 classes of {%karman%}.
